```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Set up
```{r}
library(arules)
```

## Data
```{r warning=FALSE}
dat = read.transactions("../data/transaction.txt", format = "basket", sep=",")
```

## Apriori
```{r}
rules = apriori(dat, parameter = list(supp = 100/120000, conf = 0.9, target = "rules"))
inspect(rules)
```
